Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml.config

Class SamlAuthenticationHandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config.AbstractHandlerFactory<AuthenticationHandler>
se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml.config.SamlAuthenticationHandlerFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
HandlerFactory<AuthenticationHandler>
public class SamlAuthenticationHandlerFactory extends AbstractHandlerFactory<AuthenticationHandler>
Base class for factories creating SAML authentication handlers.

  • Method Details

    • createHandler

      protected AuthenticationHandler createHandler(@Nonnull HandlerConfiguration<AuthenticationHandler> configuration, @Nullable BeanLoader beanLoader) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a handler instance based on the supplied configuration. The method is invoked from HandlerFactory.create(HandlerConfiguration) that already has taken care of bean loading (if necessary) and checking the any references have been resolved. The beanLoader is supplied anyway since the implementation may need to load any other bean references.
      Specified by:
      createHandler in class AbstractHandlerFactory<AuthenticationHandler>
      Parameters:
      configuration - the configuration. May be null if the factory can create a handler instance without any configuration
      beanLoader - the bean loader (may be null)
      Returns:
      a handler instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied configuration is not correct

    • assertSamlType

      protected void assertSamlType(@Nullable String type) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Asserts that a valid SAML type has been provided.
      Parameters:
      type - the SAML type (if null, the default is assumed)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - for invalid types

    • createHandler

      protected AuthenticationHandler createHandler(@Nonnull SamlAuthenticationHandlerConfiguration config, @Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.MetadataProvider metadataProvider, @Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.metadata.EntityDescriptorContainer entityDescriptorContainer, @Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.response.ResponseProcessor responseProcessor, @Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.request.AuthnRequestGenerator authnRequestGenerator, @Nonnull String preferredRequestBinding)
      Creates the SAML authentication handler.
      Parameters:
      config - the SAML configuration
      metadataProvider - the metadata provider
      entityDescriptorContainer - the metadata publisher
      responseProcessor - the response processor
      authnRequestGenerator - the AuthnRequest generator
      preferredRequestBinding - the preferred request binding URI
      Returns:
      a SAML authention handler

    • createEntityDescriptor

      protected org.opensaml.saml.saml2.metadata.EntityDescriptor createEntityDescriptor(@Nonnull SamlAuthenticationHandlerConfiguration config, @Nullable BeanLoader beanLoader)
      Based on the configuration an EntityDescriptor is created.
      Parameters:
      config - the SAML configuration
      beanLoader - the bean loader
      Returns:
      an EntityDescriptor for the SP metadata

      Based on the SAML configuration and the metadata provider a ResponseProcessor is created.
